name: Reflections (itch) (Matthew von Wilpert)
description:
Liven up the place!

If you have any problems with the browser version, try downloading and playing the version that is compatible with your OS.

I have personally tested the Windows version, but both the Mac and Linux versions are not tested.

Controls:

W, A, S and D to move. Space Bar to increase height. Left Control to decrease height. R to restart the level. Escape to quit.

Pressing the Left Mouse Button will launch a line. Holding the Left Mouse Button will increase the amount of times the line will bounce. Pressing the Right Mouse Button will remove the most recent line. 

The inspiration for this game comes from a recent visit to GOMA (Gallery of Modern Art) in Brisbane, QLD. Looking at Lightning For Neda, by Monir Shahroudy Farmanfarmaian, I found the reflections off of all the small shards of glass to be fascinating.

Special thanks to Steve Halliwell, who made sure the line reflecting worked properly.
